The Fool (0).description: Creates the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run (The Fool excluded)

The Magician (I).description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Lucky Cards

The High Priestess (II).description: Creates up to 2 random Planet cards (must have room)

The Empress (III).description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Mult Cards

The Emperor (IV).description: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards (must have room)

The Hierophant (V).description: Enhances 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards

The Lovers (VI).description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card

The Chariot (VII).description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card

Justice (VIII).description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Glass Card

The Wheel Of Fortune (X).description: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to a random Joker

Strength (XI).description: Increases rank up to 2 selected cards by 1 (for example, 4 to 5, 10 to Jack, King to Ace, Ace to 2)

Death (XIII).description: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card

Temperance (XIV).description: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers (Max of $50)

The Devil (XV).description: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card

The Tower (XVI).description: Enhaces 1 selected card into a Stone Card

The Star (XVII).description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Diamonds

The Moon (XVIII).description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Clubs

The Sun (XIX).description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Hearts

Judgement (XX).description: Creates a random Joker card (must have room)

The World (XXI).description: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Spades
